summary: An Ordinance authorizing the Mayor and City Comptroller to issue Local Improvement Bonds for the improvement of Twenty-first Avenue from Yesler Way to East Olive Street et al in the City of Seattle, by paving with asphalt under Ordinance No. 15537, creating Local Improvement District No. 1441 prescribing the rate of interest thereon and authorizing their delivery to the contractor constructing the improvement.
